column1: [Highlight] Poster alert! Jared Harper baptizes Naz Mitrou-Long!
Knicks two-way player Jared Harper vs the Fort Wayne Mad Ants: 31 points on 10-15 shooting (4-5 from 3), 10 assists, 4 rebounds and a steal. He also hit 6 of his 8 free throw attempts
[Highlight] Poster alert! Jared Harper baptizes Naz Mitrou-Long

[Smith] The New Orleans Pelicans announced they have waived Zylan Cheatham and Jared Harper. The Pelicans also announced they have signed James Banks and Malcolm Hill. All four players will likely eventually land with the Birmingham Squadron in the G League.
